   20: -module(ssl_dist_bench_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   23: 
   24: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %% CT meta
   29: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   33: 
   34: %% Test cases
   35: -export(
   36:    [setup/1,
   37:     parallel_setup/1,
   38:     roundtrip/1,
   39:     sched_utilization/1,
   40:     mean_load_cpu_margin/1,
   41:     throughput_0/1,
   42:     throughput_64/1,
   43:     throughput_1024/1,
   44:     throughput_4096/1,
   45:     throughput_16384/1,
   46:     throughput_65536/1,
   47:     throughput_262144/1,
   48:     throughput_1048576/1]).
   49: 
   50: %% Debug
   51: -export([payload/1, roundtrip_runner/2, setup_runner/2, throughput_runner/3,
   52:         mem/0]).
   53: 
   54: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: 
   56: suite() -> [{ct_hooks, [{ts_install_cth, [{nodenames, 2}]}]}].
   57: 
   58: all() ->
   59:     [{group, smoketest}].
   60: 
   61: groups() ->
   62:     [{smoketest,   protocols()},
   63:      {benchmark,   protocols()},
   64:      {perf_record, protocols()},
   65:      %%
   66:      %% protocols()
   67:      {ssl,             ssl_backends()},
   68:      {cryptcookie,     cryptcookie_backends()},
   69:      {plain,           categories()},
   70:      {plain2,          categories()},
   71:      {socket,          categories()},
   72:      %%
   73:      %% ssl_backends()
   74:      {tls,  categories()},
   75:      {ktls, categories()},
   76:      %%
   77:      %% cryptcookie_backends()
   78:      {dist_cryptcookie_socket, categories()},
   79:      {cryptcookie_socket_ktls, categories()},
   80:      {dist_cryptcookie_inet,   categories()},
   81:      {cryptcookie_inet_ktls,   categories()},
   82:      {cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih, categories()},
   83:      %%
   84:      %% categories()
   85:      {setup, [{repeat, 1}],
   86:       [setup,
   87:        parallel_setup]},
   88:      {roundtrip, [{repeat, 1}], [roundtrip]},
   89:      {sched_utilization,[{repeat, 1}],
   90:       [sched_utilization,
   91:        mean_load_cpu_margin]},
   92:      {throughput, [{repeat, 1}],
   93:       [throughput_0,
   94:        throughput_64,
   95:        throughput_1024,
   96:        throughput_4096,
   97:        throughput_16384,
   98:        throughput_65536,
   99:        throughput_262144,
  100:        throughput_1048576]}].
  101: 
  102: protocols() ->
  103:     [{group, ssl},
  104:      {group, cryptcookie},
  105:      {group, plain},
  106:      {group, plain2},
  107:      {group, socket}].
  108: 
  109: ssl_backends() ->
  110:     [{group, tls},
  111:      {group, ktls}].
  112: 
  113: cryptcookie_backends() ->
  114:     [{group, dist_cryptcookie_socket},
  115:      {group, cryptcookie_socket_ktls},
  116:      {group, dist_cryptcookie_inet},
  117:      {group, cryptcookie_inet_ktls},
  118:      {group, cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih}].
  119: 
  120: categories() ->
  121:     [{group, setup},
  122:      {group, roundtrip},
  123:      {group, throughput},
  124:      {group, sched_utilization}
  125:     ].
  126: 
  127: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  128:     Digest = sha256,
  129:     ECCurve = secp521r1,
  130: %%%     TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.2',
  131: %%%     TLSCipher =
  132: %%%         #{key_exchange => ecdhe_ecdsa,
  133: %%%           cipher       => aes_128_cbc,
  134: %%%           mac          => sha256,
  135: %%%           prf          => sha256},
  136:     TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.3',
  137:     TLSCipher =
  138:         #{key_exchange => ecdhe_ecdsa,
  139:           cipher       => aes_256_gcm,
  140:           mac          => aead,
  141:           prf          => sha384},
  142:     %%
  143:     Node = node(),
  144:     Skip = make_ref(),
  145:     try
  146:         Node =/= nonode@nohost orelse
  147:             throw({Skip,"Node not distributed"}),
  148:         verify_node_src_addr(),
  149:         {supported, SSLVersions} =
  150:             lists:keyfind(supported, 1, ssl:versions()),
  151:         lists:member(TLSVersion, SSLVersions) orelse
  152:             throw(
  153:               {Skip,
  154:                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(TLSVersion)}),
  155: %%%         lists:member(ECCurve, ssl:eccs(TLSVersion)) orelse
  156: %%%             throw(
  157: %%%               {Skip,
  158: %%%                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(ECCurve)}),
  159:         TLSCipherKeys = maps:keys(TLSCipher),
  160:         lists:any(
  161:           fun (Cipher) ->
  162:                   maps:with(TLSCipherKeys, Cipher) =:= TLSCipher
  163:           end,
  164:           ssl:cipher_suites(default, TLSVersion)) orelse
  165:             throw(
  166:               {Skip,
  167:                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(TLSCipher)}),
  168:         %%
  169:         %%
  170:         %%
  171:         CertOptions =
  172:             [{digest, Digest},
  173:              {key, {namedCurve, ECCurve}}],
  174:         RootCert =
  175:             public_key:pkix_test_root_cert(
  176:               ?MODULE_STRING ++ " ROOT CA", CertOptions),
  177:         SSLConf =
  178:             [{verify, verify_peer},
  179:              {versions, [TLSVersion]},
  180:              {ciphers, [TLSCipher]}],
  181:         ServerConf =
  182:             [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  183:              {verify_fun,
  184:               {fun inet_tls_dist:verify_client/3,[]}}
  185:             | SSLConf],
  186:         ClientConf = SSLConf,
  187:         %%
  188:         PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  189:         %%
  190:         ServerNode = ssl_bench_test_lib:setup(dist_server),
  191:         [_, ServerHost] = split_node(ServerNode),
  192:         ServerName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_server",
  193:         ServerString = ServerName ++ "@" ++ ServerHost,
  194:         ServerConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, ServerString ++ ".conf"),
  195:         Server = list_to_atom(ServerString),
  196:         %%
  197:         write_node_conf(
  198:           ServerConfFile, Server, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  199:           CertOptions, RootCert),
  200:         %%
  201:         Schedulers =
  202:             erpc:call(ServerNode, erlang, system_info, [schedulers]),
  203:         [_, ClientHost] = split_node(Node),
  204:         [{server_node, ServerNode},
  205:          {server_name, ServerName},
  206:          {server, Server},
  207:          {server_dist_args,
  208:           "-proto_dist inet_tls "
  209:           "-ssl_dist_optfile " ++ ServerConfFile ++ " "},
  210:          {clients, Schedulers} |
  211:          init_client_node(
  212:            ClientHost, Schedulers, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  213:            CertOptions, RootCert, Config)]
  214:     catch
  215:         throw : {Skip, Reason} ->
  216:             {skip, Reason};
  217:         throw : {skipped, Reason} ->
  218:             {skip, Reason};
  219:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  220:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  221:     end.
  222: 
  223: init_client_node(
  224:   _ClientHost, 0, _PrivDir, _ServerConf, _ClientConf,
  225:   _CertOptions, _RootCert, Config) ->
  226:     Config;
  227: init_client_node(
  228:   ClientHost, N, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  229:   CertOptions, RootCert, Config) ->
  230:     ClientName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_client_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  231:     ClientString = ClientName ++ "@" ++ ClientHost,
  232:     ClientConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, ClientString ++ ".conf"),
  233:     Client = list_to_atom(ClientString),
  234:     %%
  235:     write_node_conf(
  236:       ClientConfFile, Client, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  237:       CertOptions, RootCert),
  238:     init_client_node(
  239:       ClientHost, N - 1, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  240:       CertOptions, RootCert,
  241:       [{{client_name, N}, ClientName},
  242:        {{client, N}, Client},
  243:        {{client_dist_args, N},
  244:         "-proto_dist inet_tls "
  245:         "-ssl_dist_optfile " ++ ClientConfFile ++ " "} | Config]).
  246: 
  247: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  248:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  249:     ssl_bench_test_lib:cleanup(ServerNode).
  250: 
  251: init_per_group(benchmark, Config) ->
  252:     [{effort,5}|Config];
  253: init_per_group(perf_record, Config) ->
  254:     [{perf_record,true}, {effort,10}|Config];
  255: %%
  256: init_per_group(ssl, Config) ->
  257:     [{ssl_dist, true}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "SSL"}|Config];
  258: init_per_group(dist_cryptcookie_socket, Config) ->
  259:     try inet_epmd_dist_cryptcookie_socket:supported() of
  260:         ok ->
  261:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Socket"},
  262:              {ssl_dist_args,
  263:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist_cryptcookie_socket"}
  264:             | Config];
  265:         Problem ->
  266:             {skip, Problem}
  267:     catch
  268:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  269:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  270:     end;
  271: init_per_group(cryptcookie_socket_ktls, Config) ->
  272:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_socket_ktls:supported() of
  273:         ok ->
  274:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Socket-kTLS"},
  275:              {ssl_dist_args,
  276:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_socket_ktls"}
  277:             | Config];
  278:         Problem ->
  279:             {skip, Problem}
  280:     catch
  281:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  282:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  283:     end;
  284: init_per_group(dist_cryptcookie_inet, Config) ->
  285:     try inet_epmd_dist_cryptcookie_inet:supported() of
  286:         ok ->
  287:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet"},
  288:              {ssl_dist_args,
  289:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist_cryptcookie_inet"}
  290:             | Config];
  291:         Problem ->
  292:             {skip, Problem}
  293:     catch
  294:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  295:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  296:     end;
  297: init_per_group(cryptcookie_inet_ktls, Config) ->
  298:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_inet_ktls:supported() of
  299:         ok ->
  300:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet-kTLS"},
  301:              {ssl_dist_args,
  302:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_inet_ktls "
  303:               "-inet_ktls port"}
  304:             | Config];
  305:         Problem ->
  306:             {skip, Problem}
  307:     catch
  308:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  309:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  310:     end;
  311: init_per_group(cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih, Config) ->
  312:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_inet_ktls:supported() of
  313:         ok ->
  314:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet-kTLS-IH"},
  315:              {ssl_dist_args,
  316:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_inet_ktls "
  317:               "-inet_ktls input_handler"}
  318:             | Config];
  319:         Problem ->
  320:             {skip, Problem}
  321:     catch
  322:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  323:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  324:     end;
  325: init_per_group(plain, Config) ->
  326:     [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Plain"}|Config];
  327: %%
  328: init_per_group(plain2, Config) ->
  329:     try inet_epmd_socket:supported() of
  330:         ok ->
  331:             [{ssl_dist, false},
  332:              {ssl_dist_prefix, "Plain2"},
  333:              {ssl_dist_args, "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist"}
  334:             | Config];
  335:         Problem ->
  336:             {skip, Problem}
  337:     catch
  338:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  339:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  340:     end;
  341: %%
  342: init_per_group(socket, Config) ->
  343:     try inet_epmd_socket:supported() of
  344:         ok ->
  345:             [{ssl_dist, false},
  346:              {ssl_dist_prefix, "Socket"},
  347:              {ssl_dist_args, "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd socket"}
  348:             | Config];
  349:         Problem ->
  350:             {skip, Problem}
  351:     catch
  352:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  353:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  354:     end;
  355: %%
  356: init_per_group(ktls, Config) ->
  357:     case ktls_supported() of
  358:         ok ->
  359:             [{ktls, true},
  360:              {ssl_dist_prefix,
  361:               proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config) ++ "-kTLS"}
  362:             | proplists:delete(ssl_dist_prefix, Config)];
  363:         {error, Reason} ->
  364:             {skip, Reason}
  365:     end;
  366: %%
  367: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  368:     Config.
  369: 
  370: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  371:     ok.
  372: 
  373: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
  374:     case proplists:is_defined(effort, Conf) of
  375:         false ->
  376:             %% Not a benchmark run
  377:             case atom_to_list(Func) of
  378:                 "throughput_64" ->
  379:                     Conf;
  380:                 "throughput_"++_ ->
  381:                     {skipped, "Benchmarks run separately"};
  382:                 _ ->
  383:                     Conf
  384:             end;
  385:         true ->
  386:             Conf
  387:     end.
  388: 
  389: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Conf) ->
  390:     ok.
  391: 
  392: 
  393: ktls_supported() ->
  394:     {ok, Listen} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}]),
  395:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
  396:     {ok, Client} =
  397:         gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port, [{active, false}]),
  398:     try
  399:         maybe
  400:             {ok, OS} ?= ssl_test_lib:ktls_os(),
  401:             ok ?= ssl_test_lib:ktls_set_ulp(Client, OS),
  402:             ssl_test_lib:ktls_set_cipher(Client, OS, tx, 1)
  403:         end
  404:     after
  405:         _ = gen_tcp:close(Client),
  406:         _ = gen_tcp:close(Listen)
  407:     end.
  408: 
  409: 
  410: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  411: %%% CommonTest API helpers
  412: 
  413: verify_node_src_addr() ->
  414:     Msg = "Hello, world!",
  415:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  416:     {ok,DstAddr} = inet:getaddr(Host, inet),
  417:     {ok,Socket} = gen_udp:open(0, [{active,false}]),
  418:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Socket),
  419:     ok = gen_udp:send(Socket, DstAddr, Port, Msg),
  420:     %% Ubuntu has got 127.0.1.1 in /etc/hosts, but that IP address is
  421:     %% not assigned to the interface.
  422:     %% `ip addr add 127.0.1.1 dev lo` as root solves that problem
  423:     case gen_udp:recv(Socket, length(Msg) + 1, 1000) of
  424:         {ok,{DstAddr,Port,Msg}} ->
  425:             ok;
  426:         {ok,{SrcAddr,Port,Msg}} ->
  427:             throw({skipped,
  428:                    "Src and dst address mismatch: " ++
  429:                        term_to_string(SrcAddr) ++ " =:= " ++
  430:                        term_to_string(DstAddr)});
  431:         Weird ->
  432:             error(Weird)
  433:     end.
  434: 
  435: write_node_conf(
  436:   ConfFile, Node, ServerConf, ClientConf, CertOptions, RootCert) ->
  437:     [Name,Host] = split_node(Node),
  438:     Conf =
  439:         public_key:pkix_test_data(
  440:           #{root => RootCert,
  441:             peer =>
  442:                 [{extensions,
  443:                   [
  444:                    #'Extension'{
  445:                       extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  446:                       extnValue = [{dNSName, Host}],
  447:                       critical = true},
  448:                    #'Extension'{
  449:                       extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  450:                       extnValue =
  451:                           [{directoryName,
  452:                             {rdnSequence,
  453:                              [[#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{
  454:                                   type = ?'id-at-commonName',
  455:                                   value =
  456:                                       {utf8String,
  457:                                        unicode:characters_to_binary(
  458:                                          Name, utf8)
  459:                                       }
  460:                                  }]]}}],
  461:                       critical = true}
  462:                   ]} | CertOptions]}),
  463:     NodeConf =
  464:         [{server, ServerConf ++ Conf}, {client, ClientConf ++ Conf}],
  465:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(ConfFile, [write]),
  466:     ok = file:change_mode(ConfFile, 8#400),
  467:     io:format(Fd, "~p.~n", [NodeConf]),
  468:     ok = file:close(Fd).
  469: 
  470: split_node(Node) ->
  471:     string:split(atom_to_list(Node), "@").
  472: 
  473: 
  474: -define(REPORT_FORMAT, "~s: ~w ~s").
  475: -define(REPORT_PAL(Name, Value, Info),
  476:         ?CT_PAL(?REPORT_FORMAT,
  477:                 [begin Name end, begin Value end, begin Info end])).
  478: 
  479: -define(REPORT(Name, Value, Info),
  480:         begin
  481:             report(
  482:               ?SSL_TEST_LIB_FORMAT, ?SSL_TEST_LIB_ARGS,
  483:               begin Name end, begin Value end, begin Info end)
  484:         end).
  485: report(LFormat, LArgs, Name, Value, Info) ->
  486:     ct:pal(LFormat ++ ?REPORT_FORMAT, LArgs ++ [Name, Value, Info]),
  487:     ct_event:notify(
  488:       #event{
  489:          name = benchmark_data,
  490:          data = [{value, Value}, {suite, "ssl_dist"}, {name, Name}]}),
  491:     {comment, term_to_string(Value) ++ " " ++ Info}.
  492: 
  493: -define(REPORT(Name, Value, Info, Time),
  494:         begin
  495:             report(
  496:               ?SSL_TEST_LIB_FORMAT, ?SSL_TEST_LIB_ARGS,
  497:               begin Name end, begin Value end, begin Info end, begin Time end)
  498:         end).
  499: report(LFormat, LArgs, Name, Value, Info, Time) -> % Time in microseconds
  500:     report(
  501:       LFormat, LArgs, Name, Value,
  502:       Info ++
  503:           unicode:characters_to_list(
  504:             io_lib:fwrite(" [~.1f s]", [begin Time end/1000_000]))).
  505: 
  506: term_to_string(Term) ->
  507:     unicode:characters_to_list(
  508:       io_lib:write(Term, [{encoding, unicode}])).
  509: 
  510: per_s(Bytes, Microseconds) ->
  511:     round((Bytes * 1000_000) / Microseconds).
  512: per_s(What) -> What ++ "/s".
  513: 
  514: per_ks(Rounds, Microseconds) ->
  515:     round((Rounds*1000_000*1000) / Microseconds).
  516: per_ks(What) -> What ++ "/ks".
  517: 
  518: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  519: %%% Test cases
  520: 
  521: %%-----------------------
  522: %% Connection setup speed
  523: 
  524: setup(Config) ->
  525:     run_nodepair_test(fun setup/6, Config).
  526: 
  527: setup(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  528:     Rounds = 1000 * Effort,
  529:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  530:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  531:     pong = ssl_apply(HA, net_adm, ping, [B]),
  532:     _ = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(client) end),
  533:     {Log, Before, After} =
  534:         ssl_apply(HB, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(server) end),
  535:     ?CT_PAL("Server CPU affinity: ~w -> ~w~n~s", [Before, After, Log]),
  536:     ChildCountResult =
  537:         catch ssl_apply(
  538:                 HA, supervisor, count_children, [tls_dist_connection_sup]),
  539:     ?CT_LOG("TLS Connection Child Count Result: ~p", [ChildCountResult]),
  540:     io:format("~w(~p, ~p)~n", [setup_runner, B, Rounds]),
  541:     {AccSetupTime, TotalTime, {MemA, MemB, MemText}} =
  542:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> setup_runner(B, Rounds) end),
  543:     ok = ssl_apply(HB, fun () -> setup_wait_nodedown(A, 10_000) end),
  544:     %% [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  545:     %% [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  546:     SetupSpeed = per_ks(Rounds, AccSetupTime),
  547:     CycleSpeed = per_ks(Rounds, TotalTime),
  548:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Setup Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  549:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Setup Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  550:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Setup", SetupSpeed, per_ks("setups")),
  551:     ?REPORT(Prefix++" Setup Cycle",
  552:            CycleSpeed, per_ks("cycles") ++ " " ++ MemText,
  553:            TotalTime).
  554: 
  555: %% Runs on node A against rex in node B.
  556: %%
  557: %% Can be run on two manually started nodes outside CommonTest
  558: %%
  559: setup_runner(B, Rounds) ->
  560:     MemStart = mem_start(B),
  561:     StartTime = start_time(),
  562:     AccSetupTime = setup_loop(B, 0, Rounds),
  563:     TotalTime = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  564:     MemResult = mem_stop(MemStart),
  565:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(B),
  566:     {microseconds(AccSetupTime), microseconds(TotalTime), MemResult}.
  567: 
  568: setup_loop(_B, AccSetupTime, 0) ->
  569:     AccSetupTime;
  570: setup_loop(B, AccSetupTime, N) ->
  571:     StartTime = start_time(),
  572:     try erpc:call(B, net_adm, ping, [node()]) of
  573:         pong -> ok;
  574:         Other ->
  575:             error({N,Other})
  576:     catch
  577:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  578:             erlang:raise(Class, {N,Reason}, Stacktrace)
  579:     end,
  580:     SetupTime = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  581:     [N,B] = [N|erlang:nodes()],
  582:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, {rex,B}),
  583:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(B),
  584:     receive
  585:         {'DOWN',Mref,process,_,_} ->
  586:             [] = erlang:nodes(),
  587:             setup_loop(B, AccSetupTime + SetupTime, N - 1)
  588:     end.
  589: 
  590: setup_wait_nodedown(A, Time) ->
  591:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  592:     case nodes() of
  593:         [] ->
  594:             ok;
  595:         [A] ->
  596:             receive
  597:                 {nodedown,A} ->
  598:                     ok;
  599:                 Unexpected ->
  600:                     {error,{unexpected,Unexpected}}
  601:             after Time ->
  602:                     {error,timeout}
  603:             end
  604:     end.
  605: 
  606: 
  607: set_cpu_affinity(client) ->
  608:     set_cpu_affinity(1);
  609: set_cpu_affinity(server) ->
  610:     set_cpu_affinity(2);
  611: set_cpu_affinity(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
  612:     case erlang:system_info(cpu_topology) of
  613:         undefined ->
  614:             {"", undefined, undefined};
  615:         CpuTopology ->
  616:             Log = taskset(element(Index, split_cpus(CpuTopology))),
  617:             %% Update Schedulers
  618:             _ = erlang:system_info(update_cpu_info),
  619:             Schedulers = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  620:             {Log,
  621:              erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, Schedulers),
  622:              Schedulers}
  623:     end.
  624: 
  625: taskset(LogicalProcessors) ->
  626:     os:cmd(
  627:       "taskset -c -p " ++
  628:           lists:flatten(
  629:             lists:join(
  630:               ",",
  631:               [integer_to_list(Id) || Id <- LogicalProcessors]),
  632:             " ") ++ os:getpid()).
  633: 
  634: split_cpus([{_Tag, List}]) ->
  635:     split_cpus(List);
  636: split_cpus(List = [_ | _]) ->
  637:     {A, B} = lists:split(length(List) bsr 1, List),
  638:     {logical_processors(A), logical_processors(B)}.
  639: 
  640: logical_processors([{_Tag, {logical, Id}} | Items]) ->
  641:     [Id | logical_processors(Items)];
  642: logical_processors([{_Tag, List} | Items]) ->
  643:     logical_processors(List) ++ logical_processors(Items);
  644: logical_processors([]) ->
  645:     [].
  646: 
  647: 
  648: %%----------------
  649: %% Parallel setup
  650: 
  651: parallel_setup(Config) ->
  652:     Clients = proplists:get_value(clients, Config),
  653:     parallel_setup(Config, Clients, Clients, []).
  654: 
  655: parallel_setup(Config, Clients, I, HNs) when 0 < I ->
  656:     Key = {client, I},
  657:     Node = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  658:     Handle = start_ssl_node(Key, Config),
  659:     _ = ssl_apply(Handle, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(client) end),
  660:     try
  661:         parallel_setup(Config, Clients, I - 1, [{Handle, Node} | HNs])
  662:     after
  663:         stop_ssl_node(Key, Handle, Config)
  664:     end;
  665: parallel_setup(Config, Clients, _0, HNs) ->
  666:     Key = server,
  667:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  668:     ServerHandle = start_ssl_node(Key, Config, 0),
  669:     Effort = proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1),
  670:     TotalRounds = 1000 * Effort,
  671:     Rounds = round(TotalRounds / Clients),
  672:     try
  673:         {Log, Before, After} =
  674:             ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(server) end),
  675:         ?CT_PAL("~nClients: ~w"
  676:                 "~nServer CPU affinity: ~w -> ~w~n~s",
  677:                 [Clients, Before, After, Log]),
  678:         ServerMemBefore =
  679:             ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun mem/0),
  680:         parallel_setup_result(
  681:           Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore,
  682:           [parallel_setup_runner(Handle, ServerNode, Rounds)
  683:            || {Handle, _Node} <- HNs])
  684:     after
  685:         stop_ssl_node(Key, ServerHandle, Config)
  686:     end.
  687: 
  688: parallel_setup_runner(Handle, ServerNode, Rounds) ->
  689:     Collector = self(),
  690:     Tag = make_ref(),
  691:     _ =
  692:         spawn_link(
  693:           fun () ->
  694:                   Collector !
  695:                       {Tag,
  696:                        try
  697:                            MemBefore =
  698:                                ssl_apply(Handle, fun mem/0),
  699:                            Result =
  700:                                ssl_apply(
  701:                                  Handle,
  702:                                  fun () -> % See setup_runner/2
  703:                                          StartTime = start_time(),
  704:                                          AccSetupTime =
  705:                                              setup_loop(ServerNode, 0, Rounds),
  706:                                          TotalTime = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  707:                                          {microseconds(AccSetupTime),
  708:                                           microseconds(TotalTime)}
  709:                                  end),
  710:                            MemAfter =
  711:                                ssl_apply(Handle, fun mem/0),
  712:                            {MemBefore, Result, MemAfter}
  713:                        catch Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  714:                                {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}
  715:                        end}
  716:           end),
  717:     Tag.
  718: 
  719: parallel_setup_result(
  720:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags) ->
  721:     parallel_setup_result(
  722:       Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags,
  723:       0, 0, 0).
  724: %%
  725: parallel_setup_result(
  726:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, [Tag | Tags],
  727:   SumSetupTime, SumTotalTime, Mem) ->
  728:     receive
  729:         {Tag, {Mem1, {AccSetupTime, TotalTime}, Mem2}}
  730:           when is_integer(AccSetupTime), is_integer(TotalTime) ->
  731:             parallel_setup_result(
  732:               Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags,
  733:               SumSetupTime + AccSetupTime, SumTotalTime + TotalTime,
  734:               Mem + Mem2 - Mem1);
  735:         {Tag, Error} ->
  736:             exit(Error)
  737:     end;
  738: parallel_setup_result(
  739:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, [],
  740:   SumSetupTime, SumTotalTime, Mem) ->
  741:     ServerMemAfter =
  742:         ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun mem/0),
  743:     ServerMem = ServerMemAfter - ServerMemBefore,
  744:     Clients = proplists:get_value(clients, Config),
  745:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
  746:     SetupSpeed = per_ks(TotalRounds, SumSetupTime),
  747:     CycleSpeed = per_ks(TotalRounds, SumTotalTime),
  748:     {MemC, MemS, MemText} = mem_result({Mem / Clients, ServerMem}),
  749:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Parallel Setup Mem Clients", MemC, "KByte"),
  750:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Parallel Setup Mem Server", MemS, "KByte"),
  751:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Parallel Setup", SetupSpeed, per_ks("setups")),
  752:     ?REPORT(
  753:       Prefix++" Parallel Setup Cycle",
  754:       CycleSpeed, per_ks("cycles") ++ " " ++ MemText,
  755:       SumTotalTime / Clients).
  756: 
  757: %%----------------
  758: %% Roundtrip speed
  759: 
  760: roundtrip(Config) ->
  761:     run_nodepair_test(fun roundtrip/6, Config).
  762: 
  763: roundtrip(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  764:     Rounds = 20_000 * Effort,
  765:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  766:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  767:     ok = ssl_apply(HA, net_kernel, allow, [[B]]),
  768:     ok = ssl_apply(HB, net_kernel, allow, [[A]]),
  769:     io:format("~w(~p, ~p)~n", [roundtrip_runner, B, Rounds]),
  770:     {Time, {MemA, MemB, MemText}} =
  771:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> roundtrip_runner(B, Rounds) end),
  772:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  773:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  774:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Roundtrip Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  775:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Roundtrip Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  776:     ?REPORT(Prefix++" Roundtrip",
  777:             per_s(Rounds, Time), per_s("pings") ++ " " ++ MemText, Time).
  778: 
  779: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
  780: %%
  781: %% Can be run on two manually started nodes outside CommonTest
  782: %%
  783: roundtrip_runner(B, Rounds) ->
  784:     A = node(),
  785:     ClientPid = self(),
  786:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
  787:     ServerPid =
  788:         erlang:spawn(
  789:           B,
  790:           fun () ->
  791:                   roundtrip_server(ClientPid, Rounds)
  792:           end),
  793:     ServerMon = erlang:monitor(process, ServerPid),
  794:     MemStart = mem_start(B),
  795:     roundtrip_client(ServerPid, ServerMon, start_time(), MemStart, Rounds).
  796: 
  797: roundtrip_server(_Pid, 0) ->
  798:     exit(ok);
  799: roundtrip_server(Pid, N) ->
  800:     receive
  801:         N ->
  802:             Pid ! N,
  803:             roundtrip_server(Pid, N-1)
  804:     end.
  805: 
  806: roundtrip_client(_Pid, Mon, StartTime, MemStart, 0) ->
  807:     Time = microseconds(elapsed_time(StartTime)),
  808:     receive
  809:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, ok} ->
  810:             {Time, mem_stop(MemStart)};
  811:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, Other} ->
  812:             exit(Other)
  813:     end;
  814: roundtrip_client(Pid, Mon, StartTime, MemStart, N) ->
  815:     Pid ! N,
  816:     receive
  817:         N ->
  818:             roundtrip_client(Pid, Mon, StartTime, MemStart, N - 1)
  819:     end.
  820: 
  821: %%---------------------------------------
  822: %% Scheduler utilization at constant load
  823: 
  824: 
  825: sched_utilization(Config) ->
  826:     run_nodepair_test(
  827:       fun(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  828:               sched_utilization(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB, Config)
  829:       end, Config).
  830: 
  831: sched_utilization(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB, Config) ->
  832:     SSL = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist, Config),
  833:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  834:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  835:     PidA = ssl_apply(HA, os, getpid, []),
  836:     PidB = ssl_apply(HB, os, getpid, []),
  837:     ?CT_PAL("Starting scheduler utilization run effort ~w:~n"
  838:            "    [~s] ~w~n"
  839:            "    [~s] ~w~n",
  840:            [Effort, PidA, A, PidB, B]),
  841:     {ClientMsacc, ServerMsacc, BusyDistPortMsgs, {MemA, MemB, MemText}} =
  842:         ssl_apply(
  843:           HA,
  844:           fun () ->
  845:                   Result = sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, SSL, Config),
  846:                   fs_log(
  847:                     Config,
  848:                     "sched_utilization.Result", Result),
  849:                   Result
  850:           end),
  851:     ?CT_LOG("Got ~p busy_dist_port msgs",[tail(BusyDistPortMsgs)]),
  852:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  853:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  854:     ?CT_LOG("Microstate accounting for node ~w:", [A]),
  855:     msacc:print(ClientMsacc),
  856:     ?CT_LOG("Microstate accounting for node ~w:", [B]),
  857:     msacc:print(ServerMsacc),
  858:     ?CT_LOG("Stats of B from A: ~p",
  859:            [ssl_apply(HA, net_kernel, node_info, [B])]),
  860:     ?CT_LOG("Stats of A from B: ~p",
  861:            [ssl_apply(HB, net_kernel, node_info, [A])]),
  862:     SchedUtilClient =
  863:         round(1000 * msacc:stats(system_runtime,ClientMsacc) /
  864:                   msacc:stats(system_realtime,ClientMsacc)),
  865:     ServerRealtime = msacc:stats(system_realtime,ServerMsacc),
  866:     SchedUtilServer =
  867:         round(1000 * msacc:stats(system_runtime,ServerMsacc) /
  868:                   ServerRealtime),
  869:     Verdict =
  870:         if
  871:             BusyDistPortMsgs =:= 0 ->
  872:                 "";
  873:             is_integer(BusyDistPortMsgs) ->
  874:                 " ?";
  875:             true ->
  876:                 ?CT_LOG("Stray Msgs: ~p", [BusyDistPortMsgs]),
  877:                 " ???"
  878:         end,
  879:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Client Mem", MemA, "KByte"),
  880:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Server Mem", MemB, "KByte"),
  881:     {comment, ClientComment} =
  882:         ?REPORT(Prefix ++ " Sched Utilization Client" ++ Verdict,
  883:                SchedUtilClient, Verdict ++ " | "),
  884:     {comment, ServerComment} =
  885:         ?REPORT(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Server" ++ Verdict,
  886:                SchedUtilServer, "per mille" ++ Verdict ++ " " ++ MemText,
  887:                round(ServerRealtime / length(ServerMsacc))),
  888:     {comment, ClientComment ++ ServerComment}.
  889: 
  890: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
  891: %% We want to avoid getting busy_dist_port as it hides the true SU usage
  892: %% of the receiver and sender.
  893: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, _SSL = true, Config) ->
  894:     sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, 200, Config);
  895: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, _SSL = false, Config) ->
  896:     %% We spawn 200 senders that send a message every 10 ms
  897:     %% which should produce a load of 20_000 msgs/s with
  898:     %% payload 1000 bytes each -> 20 MB/s
  899:     sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, 200, Config);
  900: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, Senders, Config) when is_integer(Senders)  ->
  901:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  902:     Delay = 2,
  903:     Payload = payload(1000),
  904:     Time = 1000 * Effort,
  905:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
  906:     MemStart = mem_start(B),
  907:     ServerPids =
  908:         [erlang:spawn_link(
  909:            B, fun () -> throughput_server() end)
  910:          || _ <- lists:seq(1, Senders)],
  911:     Tag = make_ref(),
  912:     ServerMsacc =
  913:         erlang:spawn_link(
  914:           B,
  915:           fun() ->
  916:                   receive
  917:                       {start,Tag,Pid} ->
  918:                           fs_log(
  919:                             Config,
  920:                             "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc.self",
  921:                             self()),
  922:                           msacc:start(Time),
  923:                           fs_log(
  924:                             Config,
  925:                             "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:start",
  926:                             ok),
  927:                           receive
  928:                               {done,Tag,Pid} ->
  929:                                   fs_log(
  930:                                     Config,
  931:                                     "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:stats",
  932:                                     ok),
  933:                                   ServerStats = msacc:stats(),
  934:                                   fs_log(Config,
  935:                                          "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:stats",
  936:                                          ServerStats),
  937:                                   exit({result,Tag,ServerStats})
  938:                           end
  939:                   end
  940:           end),
  941:     erlang:system_monitor(self(),[busy_dist_port]),
  942:     _Clients =
  943:         [spawn_link(
  944:            fun() ->
  945:                    throughput_client(Pid, Delay, Payload)
  946:            end) || Pid <- ServerPids],
  947:     %%
  948:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  949:     ServerMsacc ! {start,Tag,self()},
  950:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.self", self()),
  951:     msacc:start(Time),
  952:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.msacc:start", ok),
  953:     ClientMsaccStats = msacc:stats(),
  954:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.msacc.stats", ClientMsaccStats),
  955:     MemResult = mem_stop(MemStart),
  956:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  957:     ServerMsacc ! {done,Tag,self()},
  958:     ServerMsaccStats =
  959:         receive
  960:             {'EXIT',ServerMsacc,{result,Tag,Stats}} ->
  961:                 Stats;
  962:             {'EXIT',ServerMsacc,Other} ->
  963:                 exit({other,ServerMsacc,Other})
  964:         end,
  965:     erlang:system_monitor(self(),[]),
  966:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.ServerMsaccStats", ServerMsaccStats),
  967:     %%
  968:     {ClientMsaccStats,ServerMsaccStats, busy_dist_port_msgs(), MemResult}.
  969: 
  970: fs_log(Config, Name, Term) ->
  971:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  972:     DistPrefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
  973:     _ = file:write_file(
  974:           filename:join(PrivDir, DistPrefix ++ "_" ++ Name),
  975:           io_lib:format(
  976:             "~p~n",
  977:             [{{erlang:unique_integer([positive,monotonic]),
  978:                os:system_time(1000_000)},
  979:              Term}])),
  980:     ok.
  981: 
  982: busy_dist_port_msgs() ->
  983:     busy_dist_port_msgs(0).
  984: %%
  985: busy_dist_port_msgs(N) ->
  986:     receive
  987:         M ->
  988:             case M of
  989:                 {monitor, P1, busy_dist_port, P2}
  990:                   when is_pid(P1), is_pid(P2) ->
  991:                     busy_dist_port_msgs(N + 1);
  992:                 Stray ->
  993:                     [Stray | busy_dist_port_msgs(N)]
  994:             end
  995:     after 0 ->
  996:             N
  997:     end.
  998: 
  999: tail([_|Tail]) ->
 1000:     tail(Tail);
 1001: tail(Tail) ->
 1002:     Tail.
 1003: 
 1004: throughput_server() ->
 1005:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1006:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1007:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1008:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1009:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1010:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1011:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1012:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1013:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1014:     receive _ -> ok end,
 1015:     throughput_server().
 1016: 
 1017: throughput_client(Pid, Delay, Payload) ->
 1018:     Pid ! Payload,
 1019:     receive after Delay -> throughput_client(Pid, Delay, Payload) end.
 1020: 
 1021: %%-----------------
 1022: %% Mean load CPU margin
 1023: %%
 1024: %% Start pairs of processes with the client on node A
 1025: %% and the server on node B.  The clients sends requests
 1026: %% with random interval and payload and the servers reply
 1027: %% immediately.
 1028: %%
 1029: %% Also, besides each server there is a compute process
 1030: %% that does CPU work with low process priority and we measure
 1031: %% how much such work that gets done.
 1032: 
 1033: mean_load_cpu_margin(Config) ->
 1034:     run_nodepair_test(fun run_mlcm/6, Config).
 1035: 
 1036: run_mlcm(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1037:     ClientServerPairs = 200,
 1038:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1039:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1040:     pong = ssl_apply(HB, net_adm, ping, [A]),
 1041:     {{Count, Bytes}, {MemA, MemB, MemText}, Time} =
 1042:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> mlcm(B, Effort, ClientServerPairs) end),
 1043:     ?REPORT_PAL("Data rate", per_s(Bytes bsr 10, Time), per_s("KB")),
 1044:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" CPU Margin Mem A", MemA, "KB"),
 1045:     _ = ?REPORT(Prefix++" CPU Margin Mem B", MemB, "KB"),
 1046:     ?REPORT(
 1047:       Prefix++" CPU Margin",
 1048:       round(Count/ClientServerPairs/Effort),
 1049:       "stones " ++ MemText, Time).
 1050: 
 1051: mlcm(Node, Effort, ClientServerPairs) ->
 1052:     Delay = 10,
 1053:     BlockSize = 512,
 1054:     Payloads = mlcm_payloads(BlockSize),
 1055:     RunTime = 1000 * Effort,
 1056:     MemStart = mem_start(Node),
 1057:     Clients =
 1058:         [mlcm_client_start(Node, Delay, Payloads) ||
 1059:             _ <- lists:seq(1, ClientServerPairs)],
 1060:     receive after RunTime -> ok end,
 1061:     [Alias ! {Alias,stop} || {_Monitor, Alias} <- Clients],
 1062:     Counts =
 1063:         [receive
 1064:              {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,{Alias, Count, Bytes}} ->
 1065:                  {Count, Bytes};
 1066:              {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,Reason} ->
 1067:                  exit(Reason)
 1068:          end || {Monitor, Alias} <- Clients],
 1069:     MemResult = mem_stop(MemStart),
 1070:     {lists_sum_t2(Counts), MemResult, 1000 * RunTime}.
 1071: 
 1072: lists_sum_t2(L) -> lists_sum_t2(L, 0, 0).
 1073: %%
 1074: lists_sum_t2([], Sa, Sb) ->
 1075:     {Sa, Sb};
 1076: lists_sum_t2([{A, B} | L], Sa, Sb) ->
 1077:     lists_sum_t2(L, Sa + A, Sb + B).
 1078: 
 1079: %% Returns #{ I := binary(size I * BlockSize) }, I = 0..255
 1080: mlcm_payloads(BlockSize) ->
 1081:     Bin = rand:bytes(BlockSize),
 1082:     lists:foldl(
 1083:       fun (N, Payloads) ->
 1084:               Payloads#{N => binary:copy(Bin, N)}
 1085:       end, #{}, lists:seq(0, 255)).
 1086: 
 1087: %%-------
 1088: 
 1089: mlcm_client_start(Node, Delay, Payloads) ->
 1090:     Parent = self(),
 1091:     StartRef = make_ref(),
 1092:     {_,Monitor} =
 1093:         spawn_monitor(
 1094:           fun () ->
 1095:                   Alias = alias(),
 1096:                   Parent ! {StartRef, Alias},
 1097:                   Server = mlcm_server_start(Node, Alias),
 1098:                   mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Delay, Payloads, 0, 0)
 1099:           end),
 1100:     receive
 1101:         {StartRef, Alias} ->
 1102:             {Monitor, Alias};
 1103:         {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,Reason} ->
 1104:             exit(Reason)
 1105:     end.
 1106: 
 1107: mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Delay, Payloads, Seq, Bytes) ->
 1108:     {Time, Index} = mlcm_rand(Delay),
 1109:     Payload = maps:get(Index, Payloads),
 1110:     PayloadSize = byte_size(Payload),
 1111:     receive after Time -> ok end,
 1112:     Server ! {Alias, Seq, Payload},
 1113:     receive
 1114:         {Alias, Seq, Pl} when byte_size(Pl) =:= PayloadSize ->
 1115:             mlcm_client(
 1116:               Alias, Server, Delay, Payloads, Seq + 1, Bytes + PayloadSize);
 1117:         {Alias, stop} ->
 1118:             Server ! {Alias, stop, Bytes},
 1119:             receive after infinity -> ok end
 1120:     end.
 1121: 
 1122: %% Approximate normal distribution Index with an average of 6 uniform bytes
 1123: %% and use the 7:th byte for uniform Time
 1124: mlcm_rand(Delay) ->
 1125:     mlcm_rand(6, rand:uniform(Delay bsl (1 + 6*8)) - 1, 0).
 1126: %%
 1127: mlcm_rand(0, X, I) ->
 1128:     Time = X + 1, % 1 .. 2*Delay; average Delay
 1129:     Index = abs((I - 3*255) div 3), % 0..255 upper half or normal distribution
 1130:     {Time, Index};
 1131: mlcm_rand(N, X, I) ->
 1132:     mlcm_rand(N - 1, X bsr 8, I + (X band 255)).
 1133: 
 1134: %%-------
 1135: 
 1136: mlcm_server_start(Node, Alias) ->
 1137:     spawn_link(
 1138:       Node,
 1139:       fun () ->
 1140:               Compute = mlcm_compute_start(Alias),
 1141:               mlcm_server(Alias, 0, Compute)
 1142:       end).
 1143: 
 1144: mlcm_server(Alias, Seq, Compute) ->
 1145:     receive
 1146:         {Alias, Seq, _Payload} = Msg when is_integer(Seq) ->
 1147:             Alias ! Msg,
 1148:             mlcm_server(Alias, Seq + 1, Compute);
 1149:         {Alias, stop, _Bytes} = Msg ->
 1150:             Compute ! Msg,
 1151:             receive after infinity -> ok end
 1152:     end.
 1153: 
 1154: %%-------
 1155: 
 1156: mlcm_compute_start(Alias) ->
 1157:     spawn_opt(
 1158:       fun () ->
 1159:               rand:seed(exro928ss),
 1160:               mlcm_compute(Alias, 0, 0)
 1161:       end,
 1162:       [link, {priority,low}]).
 1163: 
 1164: mlcm_compute(Alias, State, Count) ->
 1165:     receive {Alias, stop, Bytes} -> exit({Alias, Count, Bytes})
 1166:     after 0 -> ok
 1167:     end,
 1168:     mlcm_compute(
 1169:       Alias,
 1170:       %% CPU payload
 1171:       (State +
 1172:            lists:sum([rand:uniform(1 bsl 48) || _ <- lists:seq(1, 999)]))
 1173:           div 1000,
 1174:       Count + 1).
 1175: 
 1176: %%-----------------
 1177: %% Throughput speed
 1178: 
 1179: throughput_0(Config) ->
 1180:     run_nodepair_test(
 1181:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1182:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 500_000 * Effort, 0)
 1183:       end, Config).
 1184: 
 1185: throughput_64(Config) ->
 1186:     run_nodepair_test(
 1187:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1188:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 500_000 * Effort, 64)
 1189:       end, Config).
 1190: 
 1191: throughput_1024(Config) ->
 1192:     run_nodepair_test(
 1193:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1194:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 500_000 * Effort, 1024)
 1195:       end, Config).
 1196: 
 1197: throughput_4096(Config) ->
 1198:     run_nodepair_test(
 1199:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1200:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 200_000 * Effort, 4096)
 1201:       end, Config).
 1202: 
 1203: throughput_16384(Config) ->
 1204:     run_nodepair_test(
 1205:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1206:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 100_000 * Effort, 16384)
 1207:       end, Config).
 1208: 
 1209: throughput_65536(Config) ->
 1210:     run_nodepair_test(
 1211:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1212:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50_000 * Effort, 65536)
 1213:       end, Config).
 1214: 
 1215: throughput_262144(Config) ->
 1216:     run_nodepair_test(
 1217:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1218:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 10_000 * Effort, 262144)
 1219:       end, Config).
 1220: 
 1221: throughput_1048576(Config) ->
 1222:     run_nodepair_test(
 1223:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1224:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 2_000 * Effort, 1048576)
 1225:       end, Config).
 1226: 
 1227: throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, Packets, Size) ->
 1228:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1229:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1230:     io:format("~w(~p, ~p, ~p)~n", [throughput_runner, B, Packets, Size]),
 1231:     #{time := Time,
 1232:       client_msacc_stats := ClientMsaccStats,
 1233:       client_prof := ClientProf,
 1234:       server_msacc_stats := ServerMsaccStats,
 1235:       server_prof := ServerProf,
 1236:       server_gc_before := Server_GC_Before,
 1237:       server_gc_after := Server_GC_After,
 1238:       mem_a := MemA, mem_b := MemB, mem_text := MemText} =
 1239:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> throughput_runner(B, Packets, Size) end),
 1240:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1241:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1242:     ClientMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1243:         msacc:print(ClientMsaccStats),
 1244:     Overhead =
 1245:         50 % Distribution protocol headers (empirical) (TLS+=54)
 1246:         + byte_size(erlang:term_to_binary([0|<<>>])), % Benchmark overhead
 1247:     Bytes = Packets * (Size + Overhead),
 1248:     io:format("~w bytes, ~.4g s~n", [Bytes,Time/1000_000]),
 1249:     SizeString = integer_to_list(Size),
 1250:     _ = ?REPORT(
 1251:           Prefix++" Throughput_" ++ SizeString ++ " Mem A", MemA, "KB"),
 1252:     _ = ?REPORT(
 1253:           Prefix++" Throughput_" ++ SizeString ++ " Mem B", MemB, "KB"),
 1254:     ClientMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1255:         ?REPORT(
 1256:           Prefix ++ " Sender_RelativeCoreLoad_" ++ SizeString,
 1257:           round(msacc:stats(system_runtime, ClientMsaccStats)
 1258:                 * 1000_000 / Bytes),
 1259:           "ps/byte"),
 1260:     ServerMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1261:         begin
 1262:             ?REPORT(
 1263:               Prefix ++ " Receiver_RelativeCoreLoad_" ++ SizeString,
 1264:               round(msacc:stats(system_runtime, ServerMsaccStats)
 1265:                     * 1000_000 / Bytes),
 1266:               "ps/byte"),
 1267:             msacc:print(ServerMsaccStats)
 1268:         end,
 1269:     io:format("******* ClientProf:~n", []), prof_print(ClientProf),
 1270:     io:format("******* ServerProf:~n", []), prof_print(ServerProf),
 1271:     io:format("******* Server GC Before:~n~p~n", [Server_GC_Before]),
 1272:     io:format("******* Server GC After:~n~p~n", [Server_GC_After]),
 1273:     ?REPORT(
 1274:       Prefix ++ " Throughput_" ++ SizeString,
 1275:       per_s(Bytes bsr 10, Time), per_s("KB") ++ " " ++ MemText,
 1276:       Time).
 1277: 
 1278: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
 1279: %%
 1280: %% Can be run on two manually started nodes outside CommonTest
 1281: %%
 1282: throughput_runner(B, Rounds, Size) ->
 1283:     Payload = payload(Size),
 1284:     A = node(),
 1285:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
 1286:     ClientPid = self(),
 1287:     ServerPid =
 1288:         erlang:spawn_opt(
 1289:           B,
 1290:           fun () -> throughput_server(ClientPid, Rounds) end,
 1291:           [{message_queue_data, off_heap}]),
 1292:     ServerMon = erlang:monitor(process, ServerPid),
 1293:     msacc_available() andalso
 1294:         begin
 1295:             msacc:stop(),
 1296:             msacc:reset(),
 1297:             msacc:start(),
 1298:             ok
 1299:         end,
 1300:     prof_start(),
 1301:     MemStart = mem_start(B),
 1302:     #{time := Time} = Result =
 1303:         throughput_client(ServerPid, ServerMon, Payload, Rounds),
 1304:     {MemA, MemB, MemText} = mem_stop(MemStart),
 1305:     prof_stop(),
 1306:     MsaccStats =
 1307:         case msacc_available() of
 1308:             true ->
 1309:                 MStats = msacc:stats(),
 1310:                 msacc:stop(),
 1311:                 MStats;
 1312:             false ->
 1313:                 undefined
 1314:         end,
 1315:     Prof = prof_end(),
 1316:     Result#{time := Time,
 1317:             client_msacc_stats => MsaccStats,
 1318:             client_prof => Prof,
 1319:             mem_a => MemA,
 1320:             mem_b => MemB,
 1321:             mem_text => MemText}.
 1322: 
 1323: throughput_server(Pid, N) ->
 1324:     GC_Before = get_server_gc_info(),
 1325:     %% dbg:tracer(port, dbg:trace_port(file, "throughput_server_gc.log")),
 1326:     %% dbg:p(TLSDistReceiver, garbage_collection),
 1327:     msacc_available() andalso
 1328:         begin
 1329:             msacc:stop(),
 1330:             msacc:reset(),
 1331:             msacc:start(),
 1332:             ok
 1333:         end,
 1334:     prof_start(),
 1335:     throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N).
 1336: 
 1337: throughput_server_loop(_Pid, GC_Before, 0) ->
 1338:     prof_stop(),
 1339:     MsaccStats =
 1340:         case msacc_available() of
 1341:             true ->
 1342:                 msacc:stop(),
 1343:                 MStats = msacc:stats(),
 1344:                 msacc:reset(),
 1345:                 MStats;
 1346:             false ->
 1347:                 undefined
 1348:         end,
 1349:     Prof = prof_end(),
 1350:     %% dbg:flush_trace_port(),
 1351:     exit(#{server_msacc_stats => MsaccStats,
 1352:            server_prof => Prof,
 1353:            server_gc_before => GC_Before,
 1354:            server_gc_after => get_server_gc_info()});
 1355: throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N) ->
 1356:     receive
 1357:         Msg ->
 1358:             case Msg of
 1359:                 {Pid, N, _} ->
 1360:                     throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N - 1);
 1361:                 Other ->
 1362:                     erlang:error({self(),?FUNCTION_NAME,Other})
 1363:             end
 1364:     end.
 1365: 
 1366: get_server_gc_info() ->
 1367:     case whereis(ssl_connection_sup_dist) of
 1368:         undefined ->
 1369:             undefined;
 1370:         SupPid ->
 1371:             [{_Id,TLSDistReceiver,_Type,_Modules}|_] =
 1372:                 supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1373:             erlang:process_info(
 1374:               TLSDistReceiver, [garbage_collection,garbage_collection_info])
 1375:     end.
 1376: 
 1377: throughput_client(Pid, Mon, Payload, N) ->
 1378:     throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N, start_time()).
 1379: 
 1380: throughput_client_loop(_Pid, Mon, _Payload, 0, StartTime) ->
 1381:     receive
 1382:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, #{} = Result} ->
 1383:             Result#{time => microseconds(elapsed_time(StartTime))};
 1384:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, Other} ->
 1385:             exit(Other)
 1386:     end;
 1387: throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N, StartTime) ->
 1388:     Pid ! {self(), N, Payload},
 1389:     throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N - 1, StartTime).
 1390: 
 1391: 
 1392: -define(prof, none). % none | cprof | eprof
 1393: 
 1394: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1395: prof_start() ->
 1396:     cprof:stop(),
 1397:     cprof:start(),
 1398:     ok.
 1399: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1400: prof_start() ->
 1401:     catch eprof:stop(),
 1402:     {ok,_} = eprof:start(),
 1403:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling(processes()),
 1404:     ok.
 1405: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1406: prof_start() ->
 1407:     ok.
 1408: -endif.
 1409: 
 1410: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1411: prof_stop() ->
 1412:     cprof:pause(),
 1413:     ok.
 1414: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1415: prof_stop() ->
 1416:     _ = eprof:stop_profiling(),
 1417:     ok.
 1418: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1419: prof_stop() ->
 1420:     ok.
 1421: -endif.
 1422: 
 1423: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1424: prof_end() ->
 1425:     Prof = cprof:analyse(),
 1426:     cprof:stop(),
 1427:     Prof.
 1428: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1429: prof_end() ->
 1430:     eprof:dump_data().
 1431: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1432: prof_end() ->
 1433:     [].
 1434: -endif.
 1435: 
 1436: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1437: prof_print(Prof) ->
 1438:     io:format("~p.~n", [Prof]).
 1439: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1440: prof_print(Dump) ->
 1441:     eprof:analyze(undefined, total, [], Dump).
 1442: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1443: prof_print([]) ->
 1444:     ok.
 1445: -endif.
 1446: 
 1447: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 1448: %%% Test cases helpers
 1449: 
 1450: run_nodepair_test(TestFun, Config) ->
 1451:     A = proplists:get_value({client,1}, Config),
 1452:     B = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
 1453:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
 1454:     Effort = proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1),
 1455:     HA = start_ssl_node({client,1}, Config),
 1456:     try
 1457:         HB = start_ssl_node(server, Config),
 1458:         try
 1459:             TestFun(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB)
 1460:         after
 1461:             stop_ssl_node(server, HB, Config)
 1462:         end
 1463:     after
 1464:         stop_ssl_node({client,1}, HA, Config)
 1465:     end.
 1466: 
 1467: ssl_apply({Handle,_PerfTag}, M, F, Args) ->
 1468:     case ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(Handle, M, F, Args) of
 1469:         {'EXIT',Reason} ->
 1470:             error(Reason);
 1471:         Result ->
 1472:             Result
 1473:     end.
 1474: 
 1475: ssl_apply({Handle,_PerfTag}, Fun) ->
 1476:     case ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(Handle, Fun) of
 1477:         {'EXIT',Reason} ->
 1478:             error(Reason);
 1479:         Result ->
 1480:             Result
 1481:     end.
 1482: 
 1483: 
 1484: 
 1485: start_ssl_node(Spec, Config) ->
 1486:     start_ssl_node(Spec, Config, 0).
 1487: %%
 1488: start_ssl_node({client, N}, Config, Verbose) ->
 1489:     Name = proplists:get_value({client_name, N}, Config),
 1490:     Args = get_node_args({client_dist_args, N}, Config),
 1491:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1492:     {EmuPerfArg, PerfStarter} = perf_starter(Name, Config),
 1493:     Handle =
 1494:         ssl_dist_test_lib:start_ssl_node(
 1495:           Name,
 1496:           "-pa " ++ Pa ++ EmuPerfArg ++ " +Muacul 0 +IOs false " ++ Args,
 1497:           Verbose),
 1498:     PerfStarter(Handle);
 1499: start_ssl_node(server, Config, Verbose) ->
 1500:     Name = proplists:get_value(server_name, Config),
 1501:     Args = get_node_args(server_dist_args, Config),
 1502:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1503:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
 1504:     {EmuPerfArg, PerfStarter} = perf_starter(Name, Config),
 1505:     Handle =
 1506:         erpc:call(
 1507:           ServerNode, ssl_dist_test_lib, start_ssl_node,
 1508:           [Name,
 1509:            "-pa " ++ Pa ++ EmuPerfArg ++ " +Muacul 0 +IOs false " ++ Args,
 1510:            Verbose]),
 1511:     PerfStarter(Handle).
 1512: 
 1513: perf_starter(Name, Config) ->
 1514:     Parent  = self(),
 1515:     PerfTag = make_ref(),
 1516:     case proplists:lookup(perf_record, Config) of
 1517:         {_, true} ->
 1518:             {" +JPperf true",
 1519:              fun (Handle) ->
 1520:                      NodeHandle = {Handle,PerfTag},
 1521:                      NodePid = ssl_apply(NodeHandle, os, getpid, []),
 1522:                      %% The --output option is actually required since
 1523:                      %% it seems perf record, when facing a pipe as output
 1524:                      %% will per default write the collected data to it
 1525:                      PerfCmd =
 1526:                          "perf record -p " ++ NodePid ++ " "
 1527:                          "--output=" ++ Name ++ ".data --call-graph=fp",
 1528:                      ?CT_PAL("~nPerfCmd: ~s~n", [PerfCmd]),
 1529:                      _ = spawn_link(
 1530:                            fun () ->
 1531:                                    Parent ! {PerfTag, os:cmd(PerfCmd)},
 1532:                                    void
 1533:                            end),
 1534:                      NodeHandle
 1535:              end};
 1536:         _ ->
 1537:             {"",
 1538:              fun (Handle) ->
 1539:                      Parent ! {PerfTag, none},
 1540:                      {Handle,PerfTag}
 1541:              end}
 1542:     end.
 1543: 
 1544: stop_ssl_node({client, _}, {HA,PerfTag}, _Config) ->
 1545:     Result = ssl_dist_test_lib:stop_ssl_node(HA),
 1546:     perf_result(PerfTag),
 1547:     Result;
 1548: stop_ssl_node(server, {HB,PerfTag}, Config) ->
 1549:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
 1550:     Result = erpc:call(ServerNode, ssl_dist_test_lib, stop_ssl_node, [HB]),
 1551:     perf_result(PerfTag),
 1552:     Result.
 1553: 
 1554: perf_result(PerfTag) ->
 1555:     receive
 1556:         {PerfTag, none} -> ok;
 1557:         {PerfTag, PerfResult} ->
 1558:             ?CT_PAL("~n"
 1559:                     "Perf CWD: ~s~n"
 1560:                     "Perf result:~n~s~n",
 1561:                     [element(2, file:get_cwd()), PerfResult]), ok
 1562:     end.
 1563: 
 1564: get_node_args(Tag, Config) ->
 1565:     case proplists:get_value(ssl_dist, Config) of
 1566:         true ->
 1567:             case proplists:get_value(ktls, Config, false) of
 1568:                 true ->
 1569:                     "-ssl_dist_opt client_ktls true server_ktls true ";
 1570:                 false ->
 1571:                     ""
 1572:             end ++ proplists:get_value(Tag, Config);
 1573:         false ->
 1574:             proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_args, Config, "")
 1575:     end.
 1576: 
 1577: 
 1578: 
 1579: payload(Size) ->
 1580:     iolist_to_binary(
 1581:       [case Size bsr 8 of
 1582:            0 ->
 1583:                [];
 1584:            Blocks ->
 1585:                payload(Blocks, create_binary(256))
 1586:        end | create_binary(Size band 255)]).
 1587: %%
 1588: payload(0, _) ->
 1589:     [];
 1590: payload(Blocks, Block) ->
 1591:     Half = payload(Blocks bsr 1, Block),
 1592:     [Half, Half |
 1593:      if
 1594:          Blocks band 1 =:= 1 ->
 1595:              Block;
 1596:          true ->
 1597:              []
 1598:      end].
 1599: 
 1600: create_binary(Size) ->
 1601:     create_binary(Size, <<>>).
 1602: %%
 1603: create_binary(0, Bin) ->
 1604:     Bin;
 1605: create_binary(Size, Bin) ->
 1606:     NextSize = Size - 1,
 1607:     create_binary(NextSize, <<Bin/binary, NextSize>>).
 1608: 
 1609: 
 1610: start_time() ->
 1611:     erlang:system_time().
 1612: 
 1613: elapsed_time(StartTime) ->
 1614:     erlang:system_time() - StartTime.
 1615: 
 1616: microseconds(Time) ->
 1617:     erlang:convert_time_unit(Time, native, microsecond).
 1618: 
 1619: 
 1620: msacc_available() ->
 1621:     msacc:available().
 1622: 
 1623: mem_start(B) ->
 1624:     MemStartAB = {mem(), erpc:call(B, fun mem/0)},
 1625:     {MemStartAB, B}.
 1626: 
 1627: mem_stop({MemStartAB, B}) ->
 1628:     MemStopAB = {mem(), erpc:call(B, fun mem/0)},
 1629:     mem_result(mem_diff(MemStartAB, MemStopAB)).
 1630: 
 1631: mem_diff({MemA1, MemB1}, {MemA2, MemB2}) ->
 1632:     {MemA2 - MemA1, MemB2 - MemB1}.
 1633: 
 1634: mem_result({MemDiffA, MemDiffB}) ->
 1635:     MemA = round(MemDiffA / (1 bsl 10)),
 1636:     MemB = round(MemDiffB / (1 bsl 10)),
 1637:     MemText = io_lib:format("~w|~w KB", [MemA, MemB]),
 1638:     {MemA, MemB, MemText}.
 1639: 
 1640: memory(Type) ->
 1641:     try erlang:memory(Type)
 1642:     catch error : notsup ->
 1643:             0
 1644:     end.
 1645: 
 1646: -ifdef(undefined).
 1647: 
 1648: mem() ->
 1649:     lists:foldl(
 1650:       fun ({Type, F}, Acc) ->
 1651:               F*memory(Type) + Acc
 1652:       end, 0,
 1653:       [{total, 1}, {processes, -1}, {atom, -1}, {code, -1},
 1654:        {processes_used, 1}, {atom_used, 1}]).
 1655: 
 1656: -else.
 1657: 
 1658: mem() ->
 1659:     {_Current, _MaxSince, MaxEver} =
 1660:         traverse(
 1661:           fun mem/3,
 1662:           [erlang:system_info({allocator_sizes, Alloc})
 1663:            || Alloc <- erlang:system_info(alloc_util_allocators)],
 1664:           {0, 0, 0}),
 1665:     MaxEver - memory(code). % Kind of assuming code stays allocated
 1666: 
 1667: %% allocator_sizes traversal fun
 1668: mem(
 1669:   T = {instance, _, L}, [], Acc)
 1670:   when is_list(L) ->
 1671:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1672: mem(
 1673:   T = {_, L}, [{instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1674:   when is_list(L) ->
 1675:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1676: mem(
 1677:   T = {blocks, L}, [{_, _}, {instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1678:   when is_list(L) ->
 1679:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1680: mem(
 1681:   T = {_, L}, [{blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1682:   when is_list(L) ->
 1683:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1684: mem(
 1685:   {size, Current, MaxSince, MaxEver},
 1686:   [{_, _}, {blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}],
 1687:   {C, S, E}) ->
 1688:     {0, {C + Current, S + MaxSince, E + MaxEver}};
 1689: mem(
 1690:   {size, Current},
 1691:   [{_, _}, {blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}],
 1692:   {C, S, E}) ->
 1693:     %% Use Current as Max since we do not have any Max values
 1694:     %% XXX future improvement when that gets added to
 1695:     %% erlang:system_info(allocator_sizes, _)
 1696:     {0, {C + Current, S + Current, E + Current}};
 1697: mem(_, _, Acc) ->
 1698:     {0, Acc}.
 1699: 
 1700: %% Traverse (Fold) over all lists in a deep term;
 1701: %% descend into the selected element of a tuple;
 1702: %% record the descent Path and supply it to Fun
 1703: %%
 1704: %% Acc cannot be an integer
 1705: traverse(Fun, Term, Acc) ->
 1706:     traverse(Fun, Term, [], Acc).
 1707: %%
 1708: traverse(Fun, Term, Path, Acc) ->
 1709:     if
 1710:         is_list(Term) ->
 1711:             traverse_list(Fun, Term, Path, Acc);
 1712:         is_tuple(Term) ->
 1713:             case Fun(Term, Path, Acc) of
 1714:                 {0, NewAcc} ->
 1715:                     NewAcc;
 1716:                 {N, NewAcc} when is_integer(N) ->
 1717:                     traverse(Fun, element(N, Term), [Term | Path], NewAcc)
 1718:             end;
 1719:         true ->
 1720:             Acc
 1721:     end.
 1722: 
 1723: traverse_list(Fun, [Term | Terms], Path, Acc) ->
 1724:     NewAcc = traverse(Fun, Term, Path, Acc),
 1725:     traverse_list(Fun, Terms, Path, NewAcc);
 1726: traverse_list(_Fun, [], _Path, Acc) ->
 1727:     Acc.
 1728: 
 1729: -endif.
